title: Dynamic text content type has no effect
description: When selecting the dynamic text content type, no changes or effects are observed.
OB: When selecting the dynamic text content type, no changes or effects are observed.
EB: When selecting the dynamic text content type, the text on the page should dynamically update or change based on the defined rules and conditions.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the content settings.
3. Select the dynamic text content type.
4. Observe if the text on the page updates or changes based on the defined rules and conditions.
